mdata.condensed:
15" Hybrid design wheel caps
LED daytime running lights
Unique hybrid front bumper
Dual Zone climate controlled air conditioning
6 speaker audio system (Radio, CD, Aux-in, USB)
mdata.expanded:
15" Hybrid design wheel caps
LED daytime running lights
Unique hybrid front bumper
Dual Zone climate controlled air conditioning
6 speaker audio system (Radio, CD, Aux-in, USB)
Wireless door lock
Steering wheel with audio controls
Front Power Windows
Eco-driving display
EV/Eco buttons
Vehicle stability control
7 Airbags
mdata.xhtml:
A sophisticated combination of flair and quality brings you the T Spirit:

16" Turbine alloy wheels
Rear spoiler
Pluvet blue partial leather seats
Smart start
Cruise control
Rain-sensing wipers
Auto-dimming rear-view mirror
Dusk-sensing headlamps

derivatives.description: Active 1.5 VVT-i Hybrid

mdata.condensed:
MPG: 80.7
CO2: 79g/km
BIK: from 10%
Power: 100 DIN hp
mdata.expanded:
Top Speed: 103 mph
Acceleration 0-62 mph (0-100km/h): 11.8 secs
Fuel Economy (Combined): 80.7 mpg (3.5l/100km)
Carbon Dioxide Emissions: 79g/km
Power: 100 DIN hp
Torque: 82 lbft (111 Nm)

mdata.condensed:
15" alloy wheels
Body coloured Door handles
Body coloured, electric, heated door mirrors with integrated side indicators
Toyota Touch: 6.1" touch screen multimedia system
6 speaker audio system (Radio, CD, Aux-in, USB)
mdata.expanded:
15" alloy wheels
Body coloured Door handles
Body coloured, electric, heated door mirrors with integrated side indicators
Toyota Touch: 6.1" touch screen multimedia system
6 speaker audio system (Radio, CD, Aux-in, USB)
Front Fog Lamps
Hybrid Rear LED Combi lamps
Rear chrome garnish
Hybrid gear shift knob with blue insert and parking brake with blue stitching
Leather Steering Wheel with blue stitching with Audio and Bluetooth controls
Rear View Camera
Bluetooth®
mdata.xhtml:
The Yaris Hybrid T4 model features whole range of sophisticated details. These include (additional to T3)

15" alloy wheels
Toyota Touch™ Multimedia
Rear-view camera
Body-coloured door handles and mirrors with integrated turning signal
Rear privacy glass
Front fog lamps
Hybrid gear shift knob with blue insert and parking brake with blue
Stitching
LED rear combination lamps

derivatives.description: Icon plus 1.5 VVT-i Hybrid
Icon plus 1.5 VVT-i Hybrid Style

mdata.expanded:
Adding the Style pack to your Yaris Hybrid gives you the following features:
Chrome Side sills
A tasteful chrome trim to complement and enhance the Yaris's sculpted sills.
Exhaust pipe finisher
Made with a durable chrome finish to enhance the rear of your car with a sporty yet sophisticated appearance
Scuff plates
The stylish way to protect door sill paintwork against scratching. Available for the front and rear side doors, in a brushed aluminium finish

derivatives.description: Icon plus 1.5 VVT-i Hybrid Touch and Go Protection

options.options: Protection Pack, Touch and Go Navigation

mdata.expanded:
The protection pack has been designed to keep your Yaris Hybrid looking as good as new. Includes:
Front and Rear parking sensors
Front and Rear Mud flaps
Rear bumper protection plate
Boot liner
Carpet Mats

The Toyota Touch & Go multimedia system provides added conveience and on-the-go entertainment to you and your Yaris Hybrid. The following features are included when you add this option:
Rear view camera
6.1" Touch Screen Display Audio with DAB compatibility
USB and Aux-in for MP3 and WMA music files
CD Player
Bluetooth pairing
Bluetooth music streaming
mdata.xhtml: Touch and Go Navigation - full description

15" wheels with wheel caps
Black outside door handles and mirrors with integrated turning signal
